name: market for rare earth tailings, from bastnaesite and monazite ore | rare earth tailings, from bastnaesite and monazite ore | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/24722/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant. ;;This is the market for  'rare earth tailings, from bastnaesite and monazite ore', in the Global geography. ;;This market represents the conveyance of 1 kg of "rare earth tailings, from bastnaesite and monazite ore" from the location where the tailings are generated to the facility where they are processed.;As the rare earth tailings are generated close to the facility where they are processed, transport is not included.

This activity starts with the reception of rare earth tailings.

This activity ends with the delivery of rare earth tailings to the facility that processes them.
category: C:Manufacturing/24:Manufacture of basic metals/242:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals/2420:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals
